Content: Wearable technology is the next big step in improving the effectiveness of soldiers. Elbit Vice President Gil Maoz told Reuters the that equipment comprising a visor, night vision goggles, wrist-mounted computer and gunsight would help to provide soldiers with better information and communications during combat operations.
